MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the CH64 postcode area of Neston, affecting properties in The Rake, The Village and surrounding streets.  In order to complete repairs, engineers on site need to isolate the power to other properties and we expect the power to be restored by 8:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:47PM on 14th March 2021.
